## Introduction

Simple AsyncFunction builder for ES6.



## How To Use

####install

```
$ npm install asf
```

####hello world

```js
var asf = require('asf');
function * es5yield(arg1,arg2){
    var data1 = yield arg1;
    var data2 = yield * loadAsync(arg2);
    return {
        data1:data1,
        data2:data2
    }
}

async function es6(arg1,arg2){
    var data1 = await arg1;
    var data2 = await loadAsync(arg2);
    return {
        data1:data1,
        data2:data2
    }
}

//  asf(es5yield) == es6


```
